name: Crazy Big Bosses
description:
See madness, as you know, is like gravity. All it takes, is a little push!..

(с) Joker

You play as a madman who has strong attacks of galucinations ...
The only way to recovery will be to defeat your fears - to destroy monsters inspired by a sick imagination.
At your disposal are all kinds of rubbish, which you can unmask your enemy
But it's not so simple ...
4 monsters with their combat style and super-ability will not let you out of their paws so easily.
To win, you need to destroy opponents again and again !.
And only by defeating the last your monsters will retreat ...
